‘At the start my partner was unhappy about me doing this course’

Sometimes others may not be supportive.

They may fear you will be unsuccessful

They may fear you will have no time for them

They may fear you will move away from them emotionally as you make new friends

Employers may fear you will not have enough time for your job

Tip:

Remember it will not always be possible for you to allay the fears of others. However...
